title.narrative: ILO Global Business Network on Forced Labour

description.narrative: The ILO Global Business Network Forced Labour (GBNFL) is an umbrella network of networks offering a forum for collaboration convened by the ILO where companies, employer and business membership organizations (EBMOs), and business networks come together behind a common objective of leveraging comparative advantages and collective action towards the elimination of forced labour and human tra¿cking. The ILO GBNFL is a member of Alliance 8.7 and provides a vehicle for the private sector to make recognized contributions to this global partnership initiative. Where priorities are aligned, the ILO GBNFL will seek to collaborate with the various Action Groups under Alliance 8.7 to take forward specific actions while standing together with the initiative in advocating for local ownership and a focus on country level action, with governments in the driving seat. Thereby avoiding duplication and eliminating information gaps.
